title: HELP FANTASY LEAGUE
body: i cant create a fantasy league

replies.body: thanks for the help, i hope its true what u said

I was curious too, but it looks like it's not available just yet.  Per the [announcement](http://fantasy.na.lolesports.com/en-US/news/its-time-for-fantasy-lcs), it looks like leagues and drafting is aimed to unlock at 6PM pacific today.  I hope that helps clear things up.
